review: Wonderful experience at the clinic "AKSH". The Aura of the clinic is very positive and beautifully designed .  Very humble by nature, Dr Akta Bajaj is a very well experienced doctor...as they say 'the very sight of the doctor cures half the problem' . She is very friendly and polite, gives personal attention and proper time to the patient - explains the detail of the problem *** *** ***** *** ********** ********* ** **** ********* *** got relief very quickly. The staff is also very trained and courteous. My personal suggestions to all ladies is to please visit once and I'm sure then it's going to be for lifelong as the experience was so amazing. Best wishes to the Dr Akta . May you get more and more success . Sky's the limit. God bless.
